entries.original: Added `bridge/run-mcp-server.sh` wrapper that sets `NODE_PATH` to the global npm root
entries.translated: `NODE_PATH`를 전역 npm 루트로 설정하는 `bridge/run-mcp-server.sh` 래퍼 추가

entries.original: `.mcp.json` now launches via the wrapper instead of `node` directly
Global npm packages (like `@ast-grep/napi`) are now discoverable by the MCP server
entries.translated: MCP 서버에서 전역 npm 패키지(예: `@ast-grep/napi`)를 이제 탐색 가능
